author: Lizzy Gurdus
title: Facebook and one other 'up-and-comer' are top social media stock picks, traders say
description: Facebook and Snap are traders' top social media stock picks despite some of the group's heavy hitters reporting suppressed ad revenues.
content:
Are social media stocks a sound strategy in this market environment?
That's something many on Wall Street are likely wondering as stay-at-home orders are put in place nationwide and millions of U.S. workers keep the corporate engines running from quarantine.… [+3991 chars]
